attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This Country is being run into the ground by the Current Government.  We call for an Immediate Election to establish if Gordon Brown is indeed the PM that should be running the Country. If elected, we, The Country, will stand by our PM until the next Formal Election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
